title: Gazebo 1.6 errors immediately on all machines that updated using Debian installer

content.raw:
All of our machines can longer run Atlas sim after the recent upgrade.
Our current state after upgrading all machines to Gazebo 1.6 and DRCSim 2.3 via apt:


```
#!bash

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch
.....
.....
Msg Waiting for master
Error [ConnectionManager.cc:125] Conflicting gazebo versions
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.63.11
gazebo: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:418: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::transport::Publication]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

Error [ConnectionManager.cc:100] Connection Manager is not running
[ WARN] [1365438955.761112342]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw' is not yet advertised
[ WARN] [1365438955.761318557]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/left/camera_info' is not yet advertised
[ WARN] [1365438955.761388740]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/right/image_raw' is not yet advertised
[ WARN] [1365438955.761461144]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/right/camera_info' is not yet advertised
[gazebo-2] process has finished cleanly

```
content.html:
All of our machines can longer run Atlas sim after the recent upgrade. Our current state after upgrading all machines to Gazebo 1.6 and DRCSim 2.3 via apt:

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch
.....
.....
Msg Waiting for master
Error [ConnectionManager.cc:125] Conflicting gazebo versions
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.63.11
gazebo: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:418: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::transport::Publication]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

Error [ConnectionManager.cc:100] Connection Manager is not running
[ WARN] [1365438955.761112342]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw' is not yet advertised
[ WARN] [1365438955.761318557]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/left/camera_info' is not yet advertised
[ WARN] [1365438955.761388740]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/right/image_raw' is not yet advertised
[ WARN] [1365438955.761461144]: The input topic '/multisense_sl/camera/right/camera_info' is not yet advertised
[gazebo-2] process has finished cleanly
